item.title: 充电宝牵头指定单位：已获 3C 认证移动电源不受新标准影响
item.guid: 充电宝牵头指定单位：已获-3C-认证移动电源不受新标准影响
item.description:
Recently, an article published by "Blue Whale News" (Cailian Press) titled "Exclusive | 'Strictest Ever' Power Bank Safety Standard Exposed, 3C Certification Fully Invalidated, Nearly 70% of Existing Production Capacity Faces Elimination" has sparked attention for some of its content. 日前，《蓝鲸新闻》（财联社）发布的《独家｜「史上最严」充电宝安全标准曝光，3C 认证全面失效，近七成现有产能面临淘汰》一文，部分内容引发关注。

In response to the aforementioned article, the official WeChat account "CESI Safety" of the National Technical Committee for Standardization of Electronic Product Safety issued a statement to provide clarification and response. 针对上述文章，全国电子产品安全标准化技术委员会官方公众号「赛西安全」发文进行解答及回应。

The China Electronics Standardization Institute (CESI) stated that the "official release in February 2026 and implementation starting June of the same year" mentioned in the report is not yet confirmed. According to common practice, the transition period after the release of mandatory national standards is generally 6 to 12 months, and this standard will be implemented after an appropriate transition period is chosen based on suggestions from all parties. 电子标准院表示，报道中提到的「2026 年 2 月正式发布，同年 6 月起实施」尚未确定，按照惯例强制性国家标准发布后的过渡期一般为 6 至 12 个月，本标准会根据各方建议选择合适的过渡期后实施。

It is worth noting that, according to China's existing policies and regulations, mobile power products already purchased by consumers and having obtained CCC certification will not be affected after the release of this standard, and consumers can continue to hold and use them. 值得关注的是， 按照我国现有政策和法规，对于消费者已经购买的已经获得 CCC 认证的移动电源产品，本标准发布后将不受影响，消费者可以继续持有和使用。

At the same time, CESI stated that some content in the report (for example, regarding "departmental statements" and "mandatory certification" being quoted as the understanding of individual enterprise personnel) is inconsistent with China's management systems, policies, and regulations. 同时电子标准院表示，报道中部分内容（例如关于「主管部门表态」「强制认证」等内容为引用个别企业人员的理解）与我国的管理制度、政策法规等并不相符。

CESI also expressed its gratitude to the media and relevant enterprise personnel for their attention to this standard. 电子标准院也表示，其依然对该媒体以及相关企业人员对本次标准的关注表示感谢。

The Electronic Standards Institute emphasized that the purpose of formulating this standard is to improve the quality level of mobile power products, regulate market competition, protect consumers' life and property safety, and promote the high-quality development of the industry. 电子标准院强调，本次标准的制定目的是提高移动电源产品质量水平、规范市场竞争秩序、保障消费者的生命财产安全、促进行业高质量发展。

During the standard formulation process, the voices of industry and consumers will be comprehensively considered, extensive industry research and expert discussions will be conducted, enterprises and laboratories will be organized for full experimental verification, and opinions will be widely solicited from all sectors of society to ensure that the technical content of the standard is scientific, reasonable, and feasible. 标准制定过程中会综合考虑产业界和消费者的呼声，同时进行大量行业调研和专家研讨，并且组织企业和实验室进行充分试验验证，还会向社会各界进行广泛征求意见，确保标准的技术内容科学、合理、可行。

It is reported that the new version of the mobile power standard is currently in the public comment phase and has not yet been finalized. 据悉，新版移动电源标准目前正处于征求意见阶段，尚未定稿。

item.title: 苹果 AI 在华推进新动向：投诉页面短暂上线
item.guid: 苹果-AI-在华推进新动向：投诉页面短暂上线
item.description:
Yesterday, more new developments emerged in Apple Intelligence's entry into China: 昨日，苹果 Apple 智能入华进程最近出现了更多新动向：

Recently, Apple's official website launched an Apple Intelligence feedback form, requiring a mainland Chinese +86 phone number. The form allows feedback on four categories: Apple Intelligence limitations, privacy-sensitive information, general functional issues, and content security.

According to analysis, the form is primarily aimed at Apple users located in mainland China, rather than other Chinese-speaking regions such as Singapore. 而据分析， 该表单主要面向位于中国大陆的苹果用户，而非新加坡等其他使用中文的地区。

It is reported that iOS 26.2 will be the last system update released before the end of this year, but there is currently no definitive evidence that Apple Intelligence will include support for the China region in this version. 据悉，iOS 26.2 将是在今年结束前发布的最后一版系统更新，但目前还没有看到确切证据表明苹果 Apple Intelligence 会在该版本中加入对中国地区的支持。

It is worth noting that the domain name of the aforementioned page is operated by Alibaba, and the IP address shows Shanghai. Previous reports indicated that the Chinese version of the Apple Intelligence large language model is provided by Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen. 值得关注的是，上述页面的域名由阿里巴巴运营，IP 显示为上海。而此前曾有报道表示，国行版 Apple Intelligence 大语言模型由阿里通义千问提供。

However, the relevant webpage has been taken down. 但目前相关网页已下线。

item.title: 华杉未按时向罗永浩道歉，后者也未公布录音
item.guid: 华杉未按时向罗永浩道歉，后者也未公布录音
item.description:
Recently, Hua Shan, founder of Huayu & Huayu, claimed that "Xibei was schemed against," stating that Xibei is the pinnacle of China's catering industry, genuinely striving for excellence with both customers and employees. It was lured into a distorted online "Rakshasa country" and was schemed against. 近期，华与华创始人华杉称「西贝被算计」，其表示西贝是中国餐饮业的天花板，无论对顾客还是对员工，都是诚心诚意做到极致。被诱入黑白颠倒的网络罗刹国，被人算计。

In the early hours of yesterday, Luo Yonghao reposted Hua Shan's related content and stated, "Who lured? Who schemed? What do you want to do? If you can't explain clearly, I will release the recording." 而在昨日凌晨，罗永浩转发华杉相关内容并表示「谁诱的？谁算计了？你想干什么？你要是说不清楚，我就公布录音了。」

At noon yesterday, Luo Yonghao directly posted, "Xibei is undergoing rectification, this has nothing to do with Xibei, it's between Hua Shan and me." He also demanded that Hua Shan publicly apologize before 6 PM yesterday. At the same time, Luo Yonghao also emphasized: 在昨日中午，罗永浩直接发文表示「西贝正在整改，这次跟西贝无关，是我和华杉之间的事。」并要求华杉在昨日下午六点前公开道歉。同时罗永浩还强调：

If Hua Shan does not publicly apologize on Weibo, no one in China's market public relations industry will remember Huayu & Huayu in the future, only Luo & Hua.

However, as of 6 PM yesterday, neither party had made any further response. 但截至昨日下午六点，双方均未做出进一步回应。

According to information, Xibei was Huayu & Huayu's first catering client, and Huayu & Huayu and Xibei began their cooperation in 2013. Huayu & Huayu created the super symbol "I♥莜" for Xibei Noodle Village, promoting the overall upgrade of the Xibei Noodle Village brand system. 据信息显示，西贝是华与华第一个餐饮类的客户，华与华和西贝从 2013 年便开启了合作。 华与华为西贝莜面村打造了超级符号「I♥莜」，推动了西贝莜面村品牌系统整体升级。

item.title: 消息称苹果将超越三星，重回全球第一
item.guid: 消息称苹果将超越三星，重回全球第一
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, citing data firm "Counterpoint," Apple is expected to surpass Samsung and reclaim the top spot in the global smartphone market after more than a decade. 据彭博社援引数据机构「Counterpoint」消息报道， 苹果有望时隔十余年击败三星，重回全球智能手机市场第一。

The report points out that the new iPhone 17 series, launched in September this year, has been widely popular in both China and the US, attracting many users to upgrade, resulting in double-digit annual sales growth in both markets. According to previous news from Digital Chat Station, the iPhone 17 series has already achieved 10 million activations in the Chinese market. 报道指出，今年 9 月新推出的 iPhone 17 系列在中美两地都广受欢迎，吸引了不少用户升级，因此两地市场的年销售额都实现了两位数增长。据数码闲聊站此前消息，iPhone 17 系列目前已完成中国市场 1000 万的激活量。

Counterpoint predicts that iPhone shipments will grow by 10% in 2025, compared to Samsung's 4.6%. At the same time, according to the agency's forecast, iPhone will account for 19.4% of the global smartphone market share, marking Apple's return to the top spot since 2011. Counterpoint 预测，iPhone 的 2025 年出货量将增长 10%，作为对比，三星为 4.6%。同时，据机构预测，iPhone 将会占据 19.4% 的全球智能手机市场份额，而这也是苹果自 2011 年后重回榜首。

The agency also pointed out that Apple's position as a top smartphone vendor will be maintained until 2029; furthermore, the foldable iPhone to be released next year and the newly designed iPhone in 2027 will continue to expand its advantage. 机构还指出，苹果的顶级智能手机销售商地位将会保持到 2029 年；接下来，将于明年发布的折叠屏 iPhone 以及 2027 年全新设计的 iPhone 都还会继续扩大优势。

item.title: MEGA 召回导致理想损失超 11 亿元
item.guid: MEGA-召回导致理想损失超-11-亿元
item.description:
On November 26, Li Auto released its Q3 2025 financial report: 11 月 26 日，理想汽车公布 2025 第三季度财报：

Revenue was 27.4 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 36.2%; net loss was 620 million yuan, compared to a net profit of 2.8 billion yuan in the same period last year, turning from profit to loss.

According to the financial report, the company's gross profit margin for the quarter was 16.3%, amounting to 4.469 billion yuan ; while excluding the impact of MEGA vehicle recall expenses, the gross profit margin was 20.4%. It is estimated that the MEGA recall event caused Li Auto to lose approximately 1.1 billion yuan in this quarter. 据财报显示， 该季度公司毛利率为 16.3%，为 44.69 亿元 ；而在 剔除 MEGA 车型召回支出影响，毛利率则为 20.4%。 由此推算， MEGA 召回事件导致理想汽车在该季度损失约 11 亿元。

In October this year, Li Auto announced a recall of 11,411 MEGA vehicles to replace components such as coolant and power batteries, mainly due to insufficient anti-corrosion performance of the coolant which could lead to the risk of thermal runaway in the power battery. 今年 10 月，理想汽车宣布召回 11411 辆 MEGA，将更换冷却液、动力电池等部件，主要因冷却液防腐性能不足可能导致动力电池热失控风险。

During the earnings call, Li Auto CFO Li Tie responded to the above situation: 在财报电话会上，理想 CFO 李铁针对上述情况进行了回答：

Li Auto classified this recall event as a subsequent event, and therefore, the related costs will be included in the most recently auditable third-quarter financial report. This also poses considerable pressure on Li Auto's cost control center.

During the conference, Li Auto President Ma Donghui also stated that Li Auto i8 and i6 are currently in a critical phase of production ramp-up, accelerated delivery, and market penetration. He revealed that the monthly production capacity of the i6 is expected to steadily increase to 20,000 units by early next year. 会上，理想总裁马东辉还表示，目前理想 i8 和 i6 正处于产能爬坡、交付提速与市场渗透的关键阶段。其透露，预计到明年年初，i6 的月产能将稳步提升至 2 万台。

Regarding self-developed chips, Ma Donghui revealed that controllers equipped with the self-developed M100 chip are currently in the large-scale system testing phase, with commercial implementation expected to begin next year. 而在自研芯片方面，马东辉透露， 搭载自研 M100 芯片的控制器正处于大规模系统测试阶段，预计明年启动商业化落地。

It is reported that the chip was co-developed with Li Auto's self-developed foundational model compiler and software system. When integrated into the new generation VLA autonomous driving system in the future, its cost-effectiveness is expected to be more than three times that of current high-end chips. 据悉，该芯片与理想自研的基础模型编译器及软件系统协同开发，未来搭载于新一代 VLA 自动驾驶系统时，其性价比有望达到当前高端芯片的三倍以上。

Additionally, Li Auto Chairman Li Xiang recently announced that Li Auto AI smart glasses will be released, touted as "Li Auto's best AI accessory." Li Xiang also stated that Li Auto AI speakers are under consideration, hoping to achieve more comprehensive coverage of Li Auto's AI capabilities among its users. 另外，理想汽车董事长李想日前也宣布， 将发布理想 AI 智能眼镜，并号称「是理想最好的人工智能附件」。 李想还表示，理想 AI 音箱也在考虑之内，希望理想的 AI 能力实现在理想汽车用户中更全面的覆盖。

item.title: OpenAI 否认 ChatGPT 怂恿 16 岁少年自杀
item.guid: OpenAI-否认-ChatGPT-怂恿-16-岁少年自杀
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, OpenAI responded to a lawsuit alleging that ChatGPT encouraged 16-year-old Adam Raine to commit suicide, stating that chat logs show ChatGPT cumulatively issued over 100 reminders to seek help. 据彭博社报道，OpenAI 就一起指控 ChatGPT 怂恿 16 岁少年 Adam Raine 自杀的诉讼作出回应，并表示聊天记录显示 ChatGPT 累计发出超过 100 次寻求帮助的提醒。

The report noted that OpenAI stated in court documents that Adam Raine's death was heartbreaking, but the complete chat logs indicate no causal relationship between ChatGPT and the tragedy. 报道指出，OpenAI 在提交给法院的文件中表示，Adam Raine 的离世令人痛心，不过完整聊天记录表明，ChatGPT 与悲剧之间不存在因果关系。

According to the documents, Adam Raine stated in the conversation that he had repeatedly exhibited self-harm tendencies for years before using ChatGPT, including persistent suicidal ideation and thoughts. 据文件显示，Adam Raine 在对话中说明，自己在使用 ChatGPT 之前的多年里已经反复出现自我伤害倾向，包括持续浮现的自杀念头和自杀想法。

OpenAI stated that ChatGPT suggested Adam Raine contact crisis intervention agencies and trusted people in his life in multiple conversations, totaling over 100 times. The documents also show that in the weeks and days before his death, Adam Raine told ChatGPT that he had continuously sought help from important people around him, but his pleas consistently went unanswered. 而 OpenAI 方面表示，ChatGPT 在多次对话中建议 Adam Raine 联系危机干预机构以及生活中可信赖的人，总次数超过 100 次。 文件同时显示，Adam Raine 在离世前的数周与数天曾告诉 ChatGPT，自己持续向周围的重要关系人求助，但求助始终未得到回应。

It is reported that Adam Raine's family sued OpenAI and Altman in August, alleging that ChatGPT provided knot-tying instructions and offered to help write a suicide note. 据悉，Adam Raine 的家人 8 月向法院起诉 OpenAI 与奥尔特曼，指控 ChatGPT 提供了打结方式并表示可以协助撰写遗书。

Following the exposure of the lawsuit, OpenAI announced several adjustments to ChatGPT in September this year, including allowing parents to restrict how teenagers use it and issuing alerts to parents when ChatGPT identifies that a teenager might be emotionally distressed. 在诉讼曝光后，OpenAI 于今年 9 月宣布对 ChatGPT 作出多项调整，包括让家长能够限制青少年使用方式，并在 ChatGPT 识别青少年可能情绪异常时向家长发出提示。

item.title: 前特斯拉机器人团队成员加入小米
item.guid: 前特斯拉机器人团队成员加入小米
item.description:
Image from Lu Zewen's Xiaohongshu (Zach Lu Zeyu)

Recently, Lu Zeyu, a former member of Tesla's humanoid robot Optimus team, announced on his personal account that he has officially joined Xiaomi's robot dexterous hand team as its head. 日前， 前特斯拉人形机器人 Optimus 团队成员卢泽宇在个人账号宣布，正式加入小米机器人灵巧手团队，并担任负责人。

According to Lu Zeyu, he previously worked in the Optimus dexterous hand team for over two years and also conducted research in related fields during his doctoral studies. 据卢泽宇自己介绍，其此前在 Optimus 灵巧手团队工作了两年多，并且博士期间也一直从事相关领域的研究。

According to his LinkedIn profile, he was primarily responsible for the hand design of the Optimus robot, involving core technologies such as tactile sensor development, dexterous grasping and manipulation, and hand structure design. 据领英界面显示， 其主要负责 Optimus 机器人的手部设计，涉及触觉传感器开发、灵巧抓取与操作、手部结构设计等核心技术。

Lu Zeyu stated that he hopes to work with more like-minded excellent colleagues at Xiaomi to accelerate the convergence of dexterous hand technology pathways and its engineering implementation. 卢泽宇表示，希望能在小米和更多志同道合的优秀同学一起加速灵巧手技术路径收敛和工程化落地。

According to public information, Xiaomi has been exploring robots for four years. In August 2021, the Xiaomi Robotics Lab was established, focusing on bionic robot technology research and development. In September of the same year, Cui Baoqiu, then Vice President of Xiaomi Group, proposed the establishment of an "open-source robotics community" to promote technology sharing and industry collaboration. 据公开信息显示，小米对机器人的探索已有四年。2021 年 8 月，小米机器人实验室成立，专注于仿生机器人技术研发。同年 9 月，时任小米集团副总裁崔宝秋提出筹建「机器人开源社区」，推动技术共享与行业协作。

In August 2022, Xiaomi launched its first full-size humanoid bionic robot, CyberOne (Tieda), primarily used for home care and companionship scenarios. 小米于 2022 年 8 月曾推出过首款全尺寸人形仿生机器人 CyberOne（铁大），主要应用于家庭护理与陪伴场景。

In addition, Xiaomi recently announced its embodied large model "MiMo-Embodied," which has become the industry's first cross-domain embodied foundation model to successfully integrate autonomous driving and embodied intelligence. 另外，小米近期还公布了具身大模型「MiMo-Embodied」，该模型成为业界首个成功打通自动驾驶与具身智能的跨域具身基座模型。

item.title: 原极氪 CMO 关海涛确认回归荣耀
item.guid: 原极氪-CMO-关海涛确认回归荣耀
item.description:
According to multiple reports, Guan Haitao, former Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) of Zeekr Automobile, recently returned to Honor, responsible for global marketing. 据多方报道，原极氪汽车首席品牌官（CMO）关海涛近日回归荣耀，负责全球市场营销。

It is reported that Guan Haitao has officially joined the "Marketing Department" under Honor's Marketing and Sales Service Department, primarily responsible for overseas market marketing and institutional marketing capability building. 据悉， 关海涛正式入职荣耀 Marketing 与销售服务部下辖的「市场营销部」，主要负责面向海外市场营销和机关营销能力建设。

As the head of this department, he will report to both the President of Honor's Marketing and Sales Service Department and the President of the Brand Marketing Department, two first-level department presidents. 其将作为该部门负责人向荣耀 Marketing 与销售服务部总裁及品牌营销部总裁两个一级部门总裁双线汇报工作。

According to information, Guan Haitao previously worked for Yili, Tencent, etc. He joined Huawei in 2018, where he served as Deputy Minister of the Marketing Department of Honor Business Unit, CMO of China Region, and Minister of the E-commerce Department of China Region, among other positions. In September 2023, he joined Zeekr. 资料显示，关海涛曾供职于伊利、腾讯等，2018 年入职华为，曾担任荣耀业务部营销部副部长、中国区 CMO、中国区电商部部长等职，2023 年 9 月加入极氪。

item.title: 特斯拉副总裁否认「供应链去中国化」
item.guid: 特斯拉副总裁否认「供应链去中国化」
item.description:
Recently, the Wall Street Journal reported that "Tesla requires suppliers to exclude Chinese components from North American manufacturing." 近期，华尔街日报报道称「特斯拉要求供应商在北美制造环节排除中国零部件」。

Regarding the above report, Tesla Vice President Tao Lin posted yesterday, stating: 对于上述报道，特斯拉副总裁陶琳昨日发文表示：

Whether in the United States, China, or Europe, Tesla's global production bases adopt the same strict and objective standards for supplier selection, based entirely on quality, total cost, technological maturity, and long-term supply continuity. The country of origin or geographical source of a supplier does not constitute an exclusionary standard.

At the same time, Tao Lin also reposted previously published content. According to her, Tesla has partnered with over 400 local Chinese supply chain partners to pursue the best quality, highest efficiency, and optimal cost, creating the best products for millions of users in the domestic, Asia-Pacific, and European markets. 同时陶琳还转发了此前发布的内容。据其透露，特斯拉已和中国本土的 400 多家供应链伙伴们一起，追求最好的品质、最高的效率和最优的成本，为国内、亚太和欧洲市场的数百万用户打造最棒的产品。

It is reported that over 95% of the parts in every Tesla Model 3 and refreshed Model Y are produced in China. 据悉，特斯拉每一辆 Model 3 和焕新 Model Y 上，超过 95% 的零件都产自中国。

item.title: 阿里千问与夸克 AI 浏览器宣布深度融合
item.guid: 阿里千问与夸克-AI-浏览器宣布深度融合
item.description:
On November 26, Alibaba's Qianwen deeply integrated with the new Quark AI Browser, becoming a desktop-level intelligent assistant with global capabilities. 11 月 26 日，阿里千问与全新的夸克 AI 浏览器深度融合，成为具备全局能力的的桌面级智能助理。

It is reported that the new Quark AI Browser is a key move in Alibaba's "Qianwen Project," aiming to make the browser the core carrier for Qianwen's capabilities in the next stage. 据悉，全新的夸克 AI 浏览器是阿里「千问项目」的关键落子，旨在把浏览器打造为下一阶段千问能力的核心载体。

According to the official introduction, Qianwen is deeply embedded in Quark's usual minimalist interface. Users can directly invoke Qianwen from the homepage search bar and sidebar, achieving smooth interactions like "browsing while conversing, summarizing while reading, and instant Q&A" without switching tabs. 据官方介绍，千问深度内嵌于夸克惯有的简约界面，用户在首页搜索框和侧边栏可直接调用千问，无需切换标签页便可完成「边浏览边对话、边看边总结、即问即答」的流畅交互。

Users can also choose to have Qianwen "resident on the desktop." Without opening the Quark AI Browser, users can directly activate six major "Qianwen Smart Suite" capabilities—screen reading, quick box, sidebar, floating ball, word selection, and screenshot—integrating AI capabilities across high-frequency scenarios such as searching, reading, document writing, and file processing. 用户还可选择将千问「常驻桌面」。在无需打开夸克 AI 浏览器的情况下，用户可直接唤起六大「千问智能套件」能力——读屏、快捷框、侧边栏、悬浮球、划词和截屏，将 AI 能力贯穿于搜索、阅读、文档撰写、文件处理等高频场景。

It is worth mentioning that, according to sources close to the project, the Quark AI Browser has been installed on computers up to 110 million times. 值得一提的是，据接近项目的人士透露，夸克 AI 浏览器在电脑上的安装量高达 1.1 亿。

🔗 We also experienced the fully upgraded Quark AI Browser: Quark AI Browser fully upgraded, Qianwen can be invoked at any time 🔗 我们也对全面升级的夸克 AI 浏览器进行了体验： 夸克 AI 浏览器全面升级，可随时唤起千问

item.title: 腾讯混元 3D 创作引擎推出国际站
item.guid: 腾讯混元-3D-创作引擎推出国际站
item.description:
On November 26, Tencent Hunyuan 3D Creation Engine officially launched its international site, open to international users. Concurrently, the Hunyuan 3D Model API went live on Tencent Cloud International, allowing developers and enterprise users to quickly access model capabilities through this interface. 11 月 26 日，腾讯混元 3D 创作引擎正式推出国际站，面向国际用户开放。同时，混元 3D 模型 API 在腾讯云国际站上线，开发者和企业用户可以通过该接口快捷接入模型能力。

It is reported that the Hunyuan 3D model is Tencent's self-developed generative AI large model, and one of the most powerful models in Tencent's Hunyuan series, having accumulated a good reputation among developers and 3D creators both domestically and internationally. 据悉，混元 3D 模型是腾讯自研的生成式 AI 大模型，也是腾讯混元系列模型中最能打的模型之一，在国内外开发者和 3D 创作人群中积累了不错的口碑。

As of now, the Hunyuan 3D model community has over 3 million downloads, making it the world's most popular 3D open-source model. 截至目前，混元 3D 模型社区下载量超 300 万，是全球最受欢迎的 3D 开源模型。

Since the first generation model was open-sourced in November 2024, the Hunyuan 3D series models have iterated through multiple versions, continuously improving generation effects and modeling precision. 自 2024 年 11 月开源首代模型以来，混元 3D 系列模型已迭代多个版本，生成效果、建模精度不断提升。

Currently, this series of models has developed two technical routes: one is Hunyuan3D (object generation), which focuses on high-quality 3D asset production, and the other is HunyuanWorld (world model), which focuses on large-scale scenes and interactive environment construction. 目前该系列模型已经发展出两条技术路线：一是侧重于高质量 3D 资产生产的 Hunyuan3D（物体生成），二是侧重于大场景和交互式环境构建的 HunyuanWorld（世界模型）。

Among them, Hunyuan3D 3.0 version pioneered the 3D-DiT hierarchical sculpting model, solving two major generation difficulties: overall structure and local details. Its modeling precision is 3 times higher than the previous version, supporting 1536³ geometric resolution and 3.6 billion voxel ultra-high-definition modeling, maintaining industry SOTA effects. 其中 Hunyuan3D 3.0 版本，首创 3D-DiT 分级雕刻模型，解决整体结构与局部细节两大生成难点，建模精度较前代版本提升 3 倍，支持 1536³几何分辨率与 36 亿体素超高清建模，效果保持业界 SOTA。

The Hunyuan 3D platform also provides professional-grade model editing and adjustment capabilities, supporting mainstream 3D format output such as OBJ and GLB. It can be seamlessly integrated into professional software like Unity, Unreal Engine, and Blender, adapting to various professional workflows, allowing generated 3D assets to be immediately put into practical project use. 混元 3D 平台还提供了专业级的模型编辑与调整能力，支持 OBJ、GLB 等主流 3D 格式输出，可无缝集成到 Unity、Unreal Engine、Blender 等专业软件中，适配多种专业工作流程，让生成的 3D 资产能马上投入到实际项目使用。

item.title: 滴滴三季度日均订单破 5000 万单
item.guid: 滴滴三季度日均订单破-5000-万单
item.description:
On November 26, Didi released its Q3 2025 earnings report on its official website. 11 月 26 日，滴滴在其官网发布 2025 年第三季度业绩报告。

Continuing the previous growth trend, Didi's order volume and GTV maintained stable double-digit growth in the third quarter: 延续了此前增长态势，三季度滴滴订单量和 GTV 仍保持双位数的稳定增长：

Didi's core platform (China Mobility and International Business) recorded 4.685 billion orders, a year-on-year increase of 13.8%, with quarterly average daily orders exceeding 50 million for the first time. 滴滴核心平台（中国出行和国际业务）订单量达 46.85 亿单，同比增长 13.8%，季度日均订单量首次突破 5000 万单。

Among them, China Mobility grew by 10.7% year-on-year to 3.523 billion orders, with an average of 38.3 million orders per day; International Business grew by 24.3% year-on-year to 1.162 billion orders, with an average of 12.63 million orders. With the continuous growth in order volume, Didi's GTV reached 115.8 billion yuan in the third quarter, achieving a net profit of 1.5 billion yuan. 其中，中国出行同比增长 10.7% 至 35.23 亿单，日均 3830 万单；国际业务同比增长 24.3% 至 11.62 亿单，日均 1263 万单。随着订单量的不断增长，滴滴三季度 GTV 规模达到 1158 亿元，实现净利润 15 亿元。

item.title: 💡 前 OpenAI 首席科学家：仅扩大算力不足以推动 AI 发展
item.guid: 💡-前-OpenAI-首席科学家：仅扩大算力不足以推动-AI-发展
item.description:
After a long period of retreat and founding his new company SSI (Safe Superintelligence), former OpenAI Chief Scientist Ilya Sutskever, in an extremely calm tone, declared, "The era of scaling is over; we have returned to the era of research." 在隐退许久并创立新公司 SSI（Safe Superintelligence）后，前 OpenAI 首席科学家 Ilya Sutskever 用一种极其冷静的语调，宣告「Scaling 的时代结束了，我们重新回到了研究时代。」

🔗 Related reading: Ilya's Rare Statement: The Scaling Era is Over, Our Definition of AGI Might Be Completely Wrong | Interview Video with Chinese Subtitles 🔗 相关阅读： Ilya 罕见发声：Scaling 时代已结束，我们对 AGI 的定义可能全错了｜附中字访谈视频

In a recent in-depth conversation between Ilya and Dwarkesh Patel, he not only provided a technological roadmap for the future of AI but, more importantly, profoundly answered why current AI, no matter how powerful, still doesn't resemble humans. 最近一场 Ilya 与 Dwarkesh Patel 的深度对话中，他不仅给出了，对于 AI 未来的技术路线图，更重要的是，他深刻地回答了，为什么现在的 AI 即使再强，也依然不像人。

At this stage, various tech companies are investing huge sums in purchasing AI chips and building data centers to substantially improve their AI tools—whether LLMs or image generation models. As the saying goes, "the more computing power or training data you have, the smarter your AI tool will be." 现阶段，各种科技公司都投入巨额用于购买 AI 芯片和建设数据中心，以实质上改进他们的 AI 工具——无论是 LLM 还是图像生成模型。俗话说，「算力越强或训练数据越多，你的 AI 工具就越智能。」

In response, Ilya stated that over the past five years or so, this "formula" has yielded significant results. For companies, this approach is also efficient because it offers a simple and "extremely low-risk" way to invest resources, unlike putting funds into potentially fruitless research. 对此，Ilya 表示，在过去大约五年里，这种「配方」产生了显著成果。对于公司来说，这种方法也是高效的，因为它提供了一种简单且「风险极低」的投资资源方式，相比之下，将资金投入可能毫无结果的研究则不然。

However, Ilya also brutally believes that this method has reached its end, "Data is finite, and organizations already have access to vast amounts of computing power." 然而，Ilya 也很残忍地认为，这种方法已经走到了尽头， 「数据是有限的，而且组织已经能够获得大量的计算能力。」

Ilya did not deny the need for computing power; he emphasized that computing power is still necessary for research, and in an industry where all major organizations operate under the same paradigm, computing power can be one of the "important differentiating factors." Ilya 并未否定计算能力的需求，他强调计算能力对于研究仍然必要，并且在一个所有主要组织都在遵循相同范式运作的行业中，算力可以成为「重要的差异化因素」之一。

Ilya mentioned that one area requiring more research is enabling models to generalize—that is, to learn from limited information or examples, just like humans. Ilya 提到， 需要更多研究的领域之一是让模型具备泛化能力——即像人类一样，通过少量信息或示例进行学习。

He believes the most fundamental problem is that these models' generalization capabilities are, in some respects, far inferior to humans. "This is very obvious. This seems to be a very fundamental problem." 他认为，最根本的问题是这些模型在某种程度上泛化能力远不如人类。「这非常明显。这似乎是一个非常根本的问题。」

item.title: TRAE 中国版 SOLO 模式上线
item.guid: TRAE-中国版-SOLO-模式上线
item.description:
On November 25, the TRAE China version SOLO mode was launched, with a built-in intelligent agent SOLO Coder and support for a larger context window; it is currently being gradually opened for free use to users in the order of the TRAE China version waiting list. 11 月 25 日，TRAE 中国版 SOLO 模式上线，内置智能体 SOLO Coder，并支持更大上下文窗口；当前已按照 TRAE 中国版等待名单上的顺序逐步开放给用户免费使用。

According to the introduction, SOLO Coder can better support professional developers in developing 1-N type complex projects. It supports Plan: 据介绍，SOLO Coder 能更好地支持专业开发者进行 1-N 类型复杂项目的开发。其支持 Plan：

When using @SOLO Coder, open Plan and send a request. The AI will first output the development plan to the document window; if you are not satisfied, you can reject it or ask the AI to modify and adjust it until you are satisfied, then click "Execute" to proceed with development. 使用 @SOLO Coder 时打开 Plan 发送请求，AI 会先输出开发计划至文档窗口；不满意可以拒绝或者让 AI 修改调整，直到满意后点击 「执行」 才进一步开发。

At the same time, SOLO Coder can intelligently schedule multiple agents, supporting intelligent creation (generating complete content by entering a short description) or manual creation of agents. After configuration, SOLO Coder acts as the main agent, automatically calling different agents when handling complex tasks, more clearly splitting and isolating different refined tasks; users can also explicitly specify the agents to be called in the Prompt. 同时 SOLO Coder 还可智能调度多智能体，支持智能创建（输入短描述生成完整内容）或手动创建智能体。配置后，SOLO Coder 作为主智能体，在处理复杂任务时会自动调用不同智能体，更清晰地拆分和隔离不同的精细化任务；用户也可以在 Prompt 中明确指定调用的智能体。

In terms of interface, the TRAE China version SOLO mode adopts a new three-column layout, with a new multi-task window on the left, a conversation flow in the middle, and a tool panel on the right. SOLO supports multi-task parallelism, developing different functional modules simultaneously. 界面方面，TRAE 中国版 SOLO 模式采用全新三栏布局，左侧是新增的多任务窗口，中间是对话流，右边为工具面板。SOLO 支持多任务并行，同时开发不同功能模块。

Additionally, the TRAE China version SOLO mode has a built-in code change (DiffView) tool and supports context management. 另外，TRAE 中国版 SOLO 模式内置代码变更（DiffView）工具，支持上下文管理。

According to the introduction, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 adopts a 3nm process, equipped with Qualcomm's third-generation Oryon CPU (including 2 prime cores clocked at 3.8 GHz and 6 performance cores clocked at 3.32GHz). 据介绍，骁龙 8 Gen 5 采用 3nm 工艺制程，配备高通第三代 Oryon CPU（包括 2 个主频为 3.8 GHz 的 prime 核心和 6 个 3.32GHz 的性能核心）。

item.title: 广州官方公布「叉烧」英文名
item.guid: 广州官方公布「叉烧」英文名
item.description:
According to Guangzhou Daily, the Guangzhou Municipal Foreign Affairs Office recently officially released the "Guangzhou Public Place English Signage Translation and Writing Standards (2025 Edition)" (referred to as "the Standards"). 据广州日报消息，广州市委外办日前正式发布《广州市公共场所英文标识译写规范》（2025 版）（简称《规范》）。

To precisely meet Guangzhou's increasingly frequent foreign exchange demands under the new circumstances, "the Standards" systematically upgrades the 2022 edition, further optimizing the urban language environment, making public signage clearer and easier to understand, and comprehensively enhancing Guangzhou's international image and quality of foreign-related services. 为精准对接广州新形势下日益频繁的涉外交往需求，《规范》对 2022 版规范进行系统性升级，进一步优化城市语言环境，让公共标识指引更清晰易懂，全面提升广州国际化形象与涉外服务质效。

It is reported that "the Standards" focuses on nine key areas, covering public signage in nine major sections: general rules, municipal transportation, culture and tourism, sports, education, healthcare, catering and accommodation, business and finance, and government affairs. 据悉，《规范》聚焦九大重点领域，涵盖通则、市政交通、文旅娱乐、体育、教育、医疗卫生、餐饮住宿、商业金融、政务九大部分的公共标识。

It is worth mentioning that "the Standards" deeply integrates Guangzhou's local cultural genes, systematically supplementing translation and writing standards for Guangzhou city roads, classic Cantonese cuisine, characteristic attractions, and other signs in scenarios such as municipal transportation, culture and tourism, and catering and accommodation. 值得一提的是，《规范》深度融入广州本土文化基因，在市政交通、文旅娱乐、餐饮住宿等场景，系统补充广州城市道路、经典粤菜、特色景点等标识译写规范。

For example: the classic Cantonese dish Char Siu retains its original transliteration "Char Siu"; while Wonton retains its original spelling, translated as "Wonton".

Regarding the translation of century-old shop names, "the Standards" proposes to first spell out their full name in Hanyu Pinyin, and then translate their nature or product in English: for example, Tao Tao Ju should be translated as "Tao Tao Ju Restaurant". 而针对百年老店店名的翻译，《规范》则提出，先用汉语拼音拼写其全称，然后再用英文译写其性质或产品：比如，陶陶居应当译作「Tao Tao Ju Restaurant 」。

item.title: 抖音电商开启直播诈骗专项治理行动
item.guid: 抖音电商开启直播诈骗专项治理行动
item.description:
According to news from the "Douyin E-commerce Safety and Trust Center," Douyin E-commerce recently discovered various typical fraudulent methods appearing in a small number of influencer live streams, including but not limited to falsely promoting high-yield paid courses, inducing transactions on third-party platforms, and fabricating product value. 据「抖音电商安全与信任中心」消息，日前，抖音电商发现少数达人直播间出现多种典型诈骗手段，包括但不限于通过虚假宣传高收益付费课程、诱导至第三方平台交易、虚构商品价值等。

To further regulate the live e-commerce ecosystem, enhance platform trust, and protect consumer rights, Douyin E-commerce has launched a "Special Governance Action for Live Stream Fraud and Traffic Diversion," focusing on rectifying related live stream violations. 为进一步规范直播电商生态环境，提升平台信任度和保证消费者权益，抖音电商开展「直播诈骗引流专项治理」行动，重点整治相关直播违规行为。

According to its introduction, the platform will, as always, strengthen daily inspections to ensure the compliance and transparency of on-site transactions. Simultaneously, typical violation cases from this governance action were also announced: 据其介绍，平台将一如既往地加强日常巡查力度，确保站内交易行为的合规、透明。同步还公示了本次治理行动的典型违规案例：

    False High-Yield Courses and Tool Diversion: Some influencers use high-traffic AI videos as a gimmick, enticing consumers to purchase video courses and accompanying AI tools at low prices, or showcase high-volume stores, claiming that significant high returns can be achieved after studying these courses, while emphasizing low entry barriers and quick mastery. After consumers purchase relevant courses, some influencers then divert consumers to third-party platforms for multiple frauds under the guise of "AI tool transfer," one-on-one teaching on how to open a dropshipping store, or investment.

    False Material Implication and Low-Price Inducement for Sales: Some influencers verbally imply that product materials are high-value materials like gold or platinum, and sell them at ultra-low prices far below market value. Such misleading behavior not only violates platform rules but may also lead consumers to make incorrect purchasing decisions.

    False Persona Packaging and Low-Price Inducement for Purchase: Some influencers exaggerate their personal background during live streams, implying they have a certain social identity or industry status, fabricating false personas to endorse the fake "high-value" products they sell, while frequently promoting them at ultra-low prices, enticing consumers to buy so-called "high-value" products at extremely low prices.

Douyin E-commerce stated that, based on the above cases, all merchants and influencers must standardize their live stream rhetoric during broadcasts, avoid using any improper means of transaction such as exaggerating high returns from paid courses, diverting traffic to third-party platforms for investment fraud, inducing consumption through over-packaged personas, or misleading about materials. They must adhere to the bottom line of compliant operations and provide consumers with genuine and reliable products and services. 抖音电商方面表示，综合以上案例，请广大商家和达人在直播过程中务必规范直播话术，避免使用任何夸大付费课程高收益、引流至第三方平台诈骗投资、以过度包装人设诱导消费、误导材质等不当手段交易，坚守合规经营的底线，为消费者提供真实可靠的产品与服务。

item.title: 中国台湾抗日史诗电影《赛德克·巴莱》上下部官宣定档
item.guid: 中国台湾抗日史诗电影《赛德克·巴莱》上下部官宣定档
item.description:
Recently, the two-part Taiwanese anti-Japanese epic film "Warriors of the Rainbow: Seediq Bale" officially announced its release dates: 日前，中国台湾抗日史诗电影《赛德克·巴莱》上下部官宣定档：

"Warriors of the Rainbow: Seediq Bale (Part 1)" will be released on December 12, and "Warriors of the Rainbow: Seediq Bale (Part 2)" will be released on December 13. 《赛德克·巴莱（上）》将于 12 月 12 日上映，《赛德克·巴莱（下）》将于 12 月 13 日上映。

The film tells the bloody story of the Taiwanese people, unwilling to suffer humiliation, rising up and fighting back against the atrocities of the Japanese invaders. The film was nominated for the Golden Lion at the Venice International Film Festival and competed for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. 影片讲述了中国台湾人民在面对日本侵略者的暴行时，不甘屈辱、奋起反杀的血性故事。影片曾提名威尼斯国际电影节金狮奖，参与奥斯卡最佳外语片角逐。

The film was written and directed by Wei Te-sheng, and stars Lin Ching-tai, Ma Chih-hsiang, Landy Wen, Masanobu Ando, Sabu Kawahara, Umin Boya, and Jacintha Abisheg. 电影由魏德圣编剧并执导，林庆台、马志翔、温岚、安藤政信、河原萨布、徐诣帆、罗美玲等主演。

item.title: 电影《岁岁平安》发布定档预告
item.guid: 电影《岁岁平安》发布定档预告
item.description:
Recently, the film "Peaceful Years" released its official trailer and will be exclusively screened nationwide by the National Arthouse Alliance on December 16. 日前，电影《岁岁平安》发布定档预告，将于 12 月 16 日全国艺联专线上映。

The film tells an emotional story of mutual probing, guilt, and struggle between Liu Suisui (played by Duan Aojuan) and her mother Li Mei (played by Liu Weiwei). Notably, Duan Aojuan received a Best Actress nomination at the 38th Golden Rooster Awards for this film. 影片讲述由刘岁岁（段奥娟饰）和母亲李枚（刘威葳饰）之间相互试探、充满愧疚与博弈的情感故事。值得一提的是，段奥娟凭借此片获得第 38 届金鸡奖最佳女主角提名。

item.title: 动画电影《奇迹梦之队》发布新预告
item.guid: 动画电影《奇迹梦之队》发布新预告
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, the animated film "The Miracle Dream Team," produced by NBA star Stephen Curry for the first time, has released a new trailer. 据新浪电影消息，NBA 球星史蒂芬·库里首次担任制片人的动画电影《奇迹梦之队》发布新预告。

The film tells the story of Will, a small goat who dreams of becoming a professional player. Despite being naturally small, he joins his dream team with his skills. However, this dream team's performance is worrying, and facing doubts from teammates and ridicule from opponents, he continuously creates new miracles. 电影讲述梦想成为职业球手的小山羊威尔，虽然天生身材矮小，却凭借球技进入梦寐以求的球队。然而这支梦中情队赛绩成绩堪忧，面对来自队友的质疑与对手的嘲讽，他不断创造新奇迹的故事。

The film is directed by Tyree Dillihay, with Stephen Curry as producer, and the voice cast includes Caleb McLaughlin, Gabrielle Union, and Curry himself; it will be released in North America on February 13, 2026. 影片由由 Tyree Dillihay 执导，斯蒂芬·库里担任制片人，配音阵容涵盖凯莱布·麦克劳克林、加布里埃尔·尤尼恩及库里本人；将于 2026 年 2 月 13 日北美上映。
